messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Fore Primary Hallway.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to climate change, a swarm of energy draining parasites have descended into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in why.'s powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Research Initiatives

Cargo: Your station has been chosen for an epidemiological research project. Send us your cargo shuttle to receive your research samples.
